title: fried oyster mushroom broth
description: This gently spicy broth is influenced by Oriental cooking where oyster mushrooms are considered a delicacy. It is a wonderfully easy way to celebrate wild mushrooms.Each serving provides 107kcal,	6g protein, 6g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 5g fat (of which 0.8g saturates), 4g fibre and 1g salt.
ingredients: 1 banana shallot (about 80g/2¾oz), peeled and finely sliced
